title: Jackass: The Movie
description: Johnny Knoxville and his band of maniacs perform a variety of stunts and gross-out gags on the big screen for the first time.

title: Creed
description: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

title: Alita: Battle Angel
description: A deactivated cyborg's revived, but can't remember anything of her past and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
description: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

title: The Age of Adaline
description: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.
